00020 // PThreadPrivateData.h - Private data structure for Thread
00021 // ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
00022 
00023 #ifndef _PTHREADPRIVATEDATA_H_
00024 #define _PTHREADPRIVATEDATA_H_
00025 
00026 namespace OpenThreads {
00027 
00028 #include <pthread.h>
00029 #include <OpenThreads/Thread>
00030 
00031 
00032 class PThreadPrivateData {
00033 
00034     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035     // We're friendly to Thread, so it can use our data.
00036     //
00037     friend class Thread;
00038 
00039     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040     // We're friendly to PThreadPrivateActions, so it can get at some 
00041     // variables.
00042     //
00043     friend class ThreadPrivateActions;
00044 
00045 private:
00046 
00047     PThreadPrivateData() {};
00048 
00049     virtual ~PThreadPrivateData() {};
00050 
00051     volatile unsigned int stackSize;
00052 
00053     volatile bool stackSizeLocked;
00054 
00055     volatile bool isRunning;
00056 
00057     volatile bool isCanceled;
00058 
00059     volatile bool idSet;
00060 
00061     volatile Thread::ThreadPriority threadPriority;
00062     
00063     volatile Thread::ThreadPolicy threadPolicy;
00064 
00065     pthread_t tid;
00066 
00067     volatile int uniqueId;
00068 
00069     static int nextId;
00070 
00071     static pthread_key_t s_tls_key;
00072 
00073 };
00074 
00075 }
00076 
00077 #endif // !_PTHREADPRIVATEDATA_H_
